#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:88
msgid "Description:"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:89
msgid ""
"  BOSS is a utility that sorts the mod load order of TESIV: Oblivion, "
"Nehrim,  Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and TESV: Skyrim according to a "
"frequently updated  masterlist to minimise incompatibilities between mods."
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:93
msgid "Examples:"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:95
msgid "    updates the masterlist, sorts your mods, and shows the log"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:97
msgid "    reverts your load order 1 level and skips showing the log"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:99
msgid "    reverts your load order 2 levels and shows the log"
msgstr ""

msgstr ""

msgid "prints the version banner"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:198
msgid ""
"automatically update the local copy of the masterlist to the latest version "
"available on the web before sorting"
msgstr ""

#: ..\boss-cli\BOSS-CLI.cpp:201
msgid "inhibit the automatic masterlist updater"
msgstr ""
